title.rendered: FINE CHAOS AW 2024 Presentation during Copenhagen Fashion Week

content.rendered:
FINE CHAOS Fall-Winter 2024 COLLECTION "Here, After, Eternity: Netherworld"

Copenhagen, Denmark - FINE CHAOS, the avant-garde fashion house known for its narrative- driven collections, is proud to announce the launch of its AW24 collection, "Here, AGer, Eternity: Netherworld." Set against the backdrop of a dystopian 2073, this collection continues the saga from its predecessor, exploring themes of power, rebellion, and digital utopias.

The AW24 collection showcases a daring blend of futuristic designs with post-apocalyptic resilience. Garments feature a stark contrast between the raw, unrefined textures representing the desolate Outerworld and the sleek, technologically-inspired fabrics that hint at the digital paradise of The Netherworld. Each piece serves as a narrative vehicle, telling a story of a society on the brink of a new era.

Design elements such as deconstructed silhouettes, recycled materials, and integrated digital components underscore the collection's thematic focus on rebirth and innovation. The color palette transitions from the muted tones of a world in decay to vibrant hues that capture the essence of a digital frontier.

"With 'Here, After, Eternity: Netherworld,' we invite our audience into a reflective exploration of what lies beyond the end of the world as we know it," said Marc C. Mllerskov, Creative Director of FINE CHAOS. "This collection is not only a continuation of our storytelling journey but also a testament to the resilience and creativity of the human spirit."

The AW24 collection is a call to envision a future where fashion transcends traditional boundaries, reflecting FINE CHAOS's commitment to innovative design and environmental sustainability.

Looks

Photo: Press FINE CHAOS

More on: @fine.chaos


By Senior Fashion Editor 24FashionTV: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad
